section.para: librygel-core is part of the Rygel project.

This library allows in-process use of much of the DLNA and UPnP knowledge coded in Rygel. It is used by the Rygel server, librygel-renderer. It is also used by Korva, which is in turn used by the Helium UPnP control point.
